content: in last space to increase work es 237 work retp repeat pattern row again ending with 241 st change to b at the end of retp for section 7 © 2019 hayley joanne robinson tunisian sampler shawl | page 6 section 7 honeycomb alternating the tps and tps to look like honeycomb worked in b transitional row same as pattern row of section 6 245 work retp pattern row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase *tps in next st tss in next st* repeat to mark st work centre increase *tps in next st tss in next st* repeat to end tfs in last space to increase work es 249 work retp repeat pattern row 4 more times ending with 265 st change to a at the end of last retp for section 8 section 8 just like section 9 two-tone knitting working the tss in 2 colours and carrying each colour from the return of the previous row into the forward pass of the next using the tunisian knit stitch for a section that can row worked in d and e look like it was knitted worked in a transitional row with d skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tks to mark st work centre increase tks to end tfs in last space to transitional row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase work es 289 work retp in e increase tss to mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in pattern row 1 with e skip first vb tfs in first space to increase last space to increase work es 269 work retp tss to mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in last space to pattern row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase increase work es 293 work retp in d tks to mark st work centre increase tks to end tfs in last pattern row 2 with d skip first vb tfs in first space to increase space to increase work es 273 work retp tss to mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in last space to increase work es 297 repeat pattern row 3 more times ending with 285 st work retp in e change to g at the end of retp for section 10 change to d at the end of last retp for section 9 section 10 bobbles section 11 slanted a row of bobbles in between tunisian purl stitch crossing over tunisian simple stitches to create diagonal lines worked in g across the surface worked in f transitional row skip first vb tfs in first space to transitional row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tss to increase tss to mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in mark st work centre increase tss to end tfs in last space to
